data.event: The entry from 1086, reads "Germanus holds from the Bishop 8 hides of this land in ITCHEL and COVE".

event.title: was located in Workhouse Lane, Cove (now

data.event: The Farnborough workhouse was located in Workhouse Lane, Cove (now known as Union street).
This workhouse was built before 1832, was closed in 1868, sold in 1871 and demolished in the 1980s.
